long_description: The 3-season MSR Elixir 3 Tent blends generous living space with light backcountry performance to create a durable, comfortable wilderness shelter for you and a couple backpacking buddies. Lightweight design weighs in at just 5 lbs.-or set up in fast and light mode (rainfly, poles and included footprint) for only 4 lbs. 4 oz. (footprint not included). Unique pole geometry optimizes head and elbow room for livable space and fits two 25 in. wide mats (not included); adaptable rainfly allows for excellent view. 2 large doors and vestibules offer easy access. The MSR Elixir 3 Tent features a freestanding design with color-coded poles, clips and webbing for easy setup.
short_description: The 3-season MSR Elixir 3 Tent blends generous living space with light backcountry performance to create a durable, comfortable wilderness shelter for you and a couple backpacking buddies.
